mapper.select: SELECT mem_no , mem_id , mem_pw , mem_name , mem_prflimg , mem_email , mem_ph , mem_addr1 , mem_addr2 , mem_pst_cd , mem_agree , mem_intr , mem_autograph , mem_rgdt , mem_status , mem_drmnt , mem_shtot , enabled , remember_login , remember_id , (select count(*) from channel_member where mem_no = #{memNo}) channel_count FROM member where mem_no = #{memNo}

SELECT chp.plan_no plan_no , ch.ch_ttl ch_ttl , to_char(chm.ch_regdt , 'YYYY.MM.DD') ch_regdt , to_char(chm.ch_cnntdt , 'YYYY.MM.DD') ch_cnntdt , plan_ccl FROM channel_member chm JOIN channel ch ON chm.ch_no = ch.ch_no LEFT OUTER JOIN channel_plan chp ON ch.ch_no = chp.ch_no where chm.mem_no = ${memNo} AND (chp.paid_no = (SELECT MAX(paid_no) FROM channel_plan WHERE ch_no = ch.ch_no) OR chp.paid_no IS NULL) ORDER BY chm.ch_cnntdt

SELECT dclr_no , dclr_sort , dclr_cn , TO_CHAR(d.dclr_rcpt_ymd, 'YYYY.MM.DD') dclr_rcpt_ymd , dclr_id , dclr_sub_id , dclr_attach_file_id , dclr_nmtm , dclr_warn_nmtm , dclr_state , m.mem_name dclr_sub_name , m.mem_id dclr_sub_member_id , m.mem_prflimg dclr_sub_prflimg FROM declaration d JOIN MEMBER m ON m.MEM_NO = d.dclr_sub_id WHERE dclr_id = ${dclrId} ORDER BY dclr_rcpt_ymd DESC

SELECT b.* from( select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.mem_no ASC) rnum from( select m.mem_no , m.mem_name , m.mem_email , m.mem_prflimg , to_char(m.mem_rgdt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') mem_rgdt_string , m.mem_status , (select count(*) from channel_member where mem_no = m.mem_no) channel_count , to_char((select max(ch_cnntdt) from channel_member where mem_no = m.mem_no group by mem_no), 'YYYY.MM.DD') ch_cnntdt FROM member m ORDER BY mem_no ASC )a )b
where b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow}

SELECT m.mem_no , mem_id , mem_pw , mem_name , mem_prflimg , mem_email , mem_ph , mem_addr1 , mem_addr2 , mem_pst_cd , mem_agree , mem_intr , mem_autograph , TO_CHAR(mem_rgdt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') memRgdtString , mem_status , mem_drmnt , mem_shtot , enabled , remember_login , remember_id FROM member m, role r where m.mem_no = r.mem_no and r.mem_auth = 'ROLE_ADMIN'
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_name = #{memName}, mem_ph = #{memPh}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_addr1 = #{memAddr1}, mem_addr2 = #{memAddr2}, mem_prflimg = #{memPrflimg} WHERE mem_no = #{memNo}
